description: Start your day with this healthy & incredibly delicious Mango Banana Smoothie. It's thick, creamy, sweet, and perfect for a quick, easy, and filling breakfast.
keywords: banana mango smoothie, glowing skin smoothie, mango banana smoothie
name: Mango Banana Smoothie
recipeIngredient: 1 heaping cup frozen mango pieces (or 1 fresh mango and use a frozen banana)
1 tablespoon nut or seed butter (, or 2 tablespoons raw nuts or seeds)
1 tablespoon chia seeds (, or flax seeds)
1/2 teaspoon ground ginger (or a small piece of fresh ginger)
1 tablespoon of maple syrup or 1 large medjool date (, optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Add everything to a blender and blend until smooth. Add the optional maple syrup/date if some extra sweetness is required.
Adjust the milk to customize the thickness of your smoothie. Less milk to make it thicker or more milk to make it thinner.
